flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction_rendered:
Relevant parts
  • 3/4"x1.5" bolt
  • 3/4" nuts
  • 3/4" washers
Tools
  • Angle grinder
  • C-Clamps
  • MIG welder
  • Socket set and ratchet, or various wrenches
  • Vise clamps
  • torch

parts.notes: Primary arms to frame: 4, secondary arms to primary: 4, dirt keeper plate to primary arms: 4, Brickholder plate to primary arms: 4
Primary arms to frame: 4, secondary arms to primary: 4, dirt keeper plate to primary arms: 4, Brickholder plate to primary arms: 4

lines.text: Set the main frame somewhere on level ground where you have access to a welder and torch and where you have at least an 8' radius of empty space. The CEB takes up a lot of room!
lines.text_raw: Set the main frame somewhere on level ground where you have access to a welder and torch and where you have at least an 8' radius of empty space. The CEB takes up a lot of room!

lines.text: Set it so the cylinder pin is near the ground.
lines.text_raw: Set it so the cylinder pin is near the ground.

lines.text: Gather the secondary arms, the legs and the feet.
lines.text_raw: Gather the secondary arms, the legs and the feet.

lines.text: Onto the end of each leg, tighten a foot to one of its ends. Get the bolt tight enough so it won't fall off.
lines.text_raw: Onto the end of each leg, tighten a foot to one of its ends. Get the bolt tight enough so it won't fall off.

lines.text: Insert one leg/foot into each of the outside leg holders on the secondary arms.
lines.text_raw: Insert one leg/foot into each of the outside leg holders on the secondary arms.

lines.text: Adjust the height so that the top of the secondary arms will be very close to the height at the bottom of the primary arms.
lines.text_raw: Adjust the height so that the top of the secondary arms will be very close to the height at the bottom of the primary arms.

lines.text: Tighten the bolts in the leg holders so they are snug, but not too tight.
lines.text_raw: Tighten the bolts in the leg holders so they are snug, but not too tight.

lines.text: Clamp them on the drawer members on the frame so that they are in the proper orientation. See image.
lines.text_raw: Clamp them on the drawer members on the frame so that they are in the proper orientation. See image.

lines.text: If the machine is going to tip over, have a friend move the assembled secondary arms to support it so it doesn't tip.
lines.text_raw: If the machine is going to tip over, have a friend move the assembled secondary arms to support it so it doesn't tip.

steps.title: Attach the secondary arms to the primary arms

lines.text: Loosely bolt the 2 sets of arms together.
lines.text_raw: Loosely bolt the 2 sets of arms together.

lines.text: You may need to loosen the clamps on the primary arms. This is OK.
lines.text_raw: You may need to loosen the clamps on the primary arms. This is OK.

lines.text: Make sure the arms are all square to eachother.
lines.text_raw: Make sure the arms are all square to eachother.

lines.text: Tighten all bolts.
lines.text_raw: Tighten all bolts.

lines.text: Loosen the clamps attaching primary arms to the frame.
lines.text_raw: Loosen the clamps attaching primary arms to the frame.

lines.text: Square the arms to the frame.
lines.text_raw: Square the arms to the frame.

steps.title: Attach the primary arms to the frame

lines.text: Torch the holes in the frame through the holes in the primary arms.
lines.text_raw: Torch the holes in the frame through the holes in the primary arms.

lines.text: Make sure bolts go through all holes
lines.text_raw: Make sure bolts go through all holes

lines.text: Remove the clamps and grind away any slag
lines.text_raw: Remove the clamps and grind away any slag

lines.text: Bolt the primary arms to the frame.
lines.text_raw: Bolt the primary arms to the frame.

steps.title: Install Brick Holder plate, Dirt keeper plate, and sensor holder

lines.text: The plates go on the bottom side of the primary arms.
lines.text_raw: The plates go on the bottom side of the primary arms.

lines.text: If not all the bolts go through, torch away whatever is preventing it.
lines.text_raw: If not all the bolts go through, torch away whatever is preventing it.

lines.text: Bolt them down so the bolt head is on the top. Tighten the nuts snug.
lines.text_raw: Bolt them down so the bolt head is on the top. Tighten the nuts snug.

lines.text: Install the sensor on the right primary arm. Its location is circled in the diagram.
lines.text_raw: Install the sensor on the right primary arm. Its location is circled in the diagram.

guide.summary: This guide explains how to install the primary and secondary arms, the feet, the legs, the brick-holder plate, and the dirt-keeper plate to the main frame. This is to be done after you have finished all of the steps in the fabrication section on the wiki.
guide.title: CEB Press: Structural Components Assembly

tools.text: Socket set and ratchet, or various wrenches
